message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price, given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $9,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I am still unable to meet at $10,500. I would like to propose $10,000 as the price for the product. I hope this is within your range.
